Identification.ShortTitle: Security Certificate Transfer Fee (Cooperative Credit Associations) Regulations
Identification.LongTitle: Regulations Prescribing the Maximum Fee that an Assocition May Charge for a Security Certificate Issued in Respect of a Transfer

Provision.Text: His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Finance, pursuant to subsection 92(2) and section 463 of the Cooperative Credit Associations Act*, is pleased hereby to make the annexed Regulations prescribing the maximum fee that an association may charge for a security certificate issued in respect of a transfer, effective June 1, 1992.

Section.Text: These Regulations may be cited as the Security Certificate Transfer Fee (Cooperative Credit Associations) Regulations.
An association may charge a fee not exceeding five dollars for a security certificate issued in respect of a transfer.
